universal_guidelines: ALWAYS use 'framer-motion' for animations. Do not use standard CSS transitions for complex movements.
Dark Mode is MANDATORY and DEFAULT. The app should feel like a nighttime cyberpunk interface.
Use 'Orbitron' font for all H1, H2, H3 headers to establish the Sci-Fi/Gaming mood.
Borders should rarely be solid. Use alpha transparency (white/10 or white/20) to create depth.
Gradients should be subtle and dark, or used as 'glow' effects behind elements. No full-screen rainbow gradients.
Interactive elements MUST provide feedback. Hover = Glow/Scale. Click = Pulse/Glitch.
All data (analytics, stats) should look like a HUD (Heads-Up Display). Use mono fonts for numbers.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders where appropriate.
Ensure high contrast for text. Neon colors are for accents, not for body text.
Install 'framer-motion' if not present: 'yarn add framer-motion'
Install 'recharts' for analytics graphs: 'yarn add recharts'
Use 'sonner' for notifications, styled to look like system alerts.
